Address.Address1: Am Bahnhof 3, Bad Soden am Taunus

Description.Text: Hotel Rheinischer Hof is a charming 4-star property promising comfortable accommodation northwest of Frankfurt. Highlights include free Wi-Fi and onsite dining. Bad Soden is located approximately 15km from Frankfurt city centre. Places of interest include the main public square Roemerberg, main shopping street Zeil, medieval city hall building Roemer, 18th-century Paulskirche and the large Gothic church, Frankfurter Dom. Bad Soden S-Bahn station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to the city. The hotel occupies an historic mid-rise property dating back to 1897. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are spacious and decorated in a bright modern style. Amenities include a mini-bar, safe and satellite TV. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. There are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
